{{flavour|A military axe with a long haft and a single-bladed head.}}

{{crawlquote|This weapon falls into the [[Axes]] category. It is a one handed weapon.}}

The '''war axe''' is a step up from the [[hand axe]] in terms of power. Like all axes, this weapon allows the player to [[cleave]].

==Strategy==
Axes deal less damage than comparable weapons, but allow the ability to cleave. As a starting weapon, war axes are a great option for strong species like [[Hill Orc]] or [[Minotaur]]. If you care about your ability to fight single targets, you might want a different weapon.
